text: tatha bhej diye jaayenge, jo log darate rahe apane paalanahaar se, svarg kee or jhund banaakar. yahaantak ki jab ve aa jaayenge usake paas tatha khol diye jaayenge usake dvaar aur kahenge unase usake rakshakah salaam hai tumapar, tum prasann raho. tum pravesh kar jao usamen, sadaavaasee hokar
